text: Serge Dassault (; 4 April 1925 â€“ 28 May 2018) was a French heir, business executive and politician. He served as the Chairman and Chief Executive Officer of Dassault Group and a conservative politician. He was born in Paris. According to Forbes, Dassault's net worth was estimated in 2016 at US$15 billion. Dassault served in the French Senate for Essonne from 2004 to 2017 as a conservative Independent. Dassault died at the age of 93 on 28 May 2018 in Paris of a heart attack. ==References== ==Other websites== *Forbes.com: Forbes World's Richest People Category:1925 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Billionaires Category:French businesspeople Category:Politicians from Paris
title: Serge Dassault
